source: The Doré Illustrations for Dante's Divine Comedy (Dover Fine Art, History of Art)

illustrations.title: The Forest
illustrations.caption: Midway upon the journey of our life / I found myself within a forest dark, / For the straightforward pathway had been lost

illustrations.title: The Forest
illustrations.caption: Midway upon the journey of our life / I found myself within a forest dark, / For the straightforward pathway had been lost

illustrations.title: The Panther
illustrations.caption: And lo! almost where the ascent began, / A panther light and swift exceedingly, / Which with a spotted skin was covered o'er!

illustrations.title: The Lion
illustrations.caption: He seemed as if against me he were coming / With head uplifted, and with ravenous hunger

illustrations.title: The She-Wolf
illustrations.caption: Behold the beast, for which I have turned back; / Do thou protect me from her, famous Sage
